resource_explanation:
El Plano group's lecturers API(created for the group by group owner).

Course attributes :

 - `first_name` - Represents lecturer first name
 - `last_name` - Represents lecturer last name
 - `patronymic` - Represents lecturer patronymic 
 - `email` - Represents lecturer contact email address.
 - `phone` - Represents lecturer contact phone number.
 - `active` - `true` if lecturer is available in current time(can ), otherwise `false`
 - `timestamps`

Also, includes reference to the courses.
description: SHOW : Retrieve information about requested lecturer
explanation:
Returns a single instance of the lecturer.

See model attributes description in section description.

requests.curl:
curl -g "http://localhost:3000/api/v1/group/lecturers/8" -X GET \
	-H "Accept: application/vnd.api+json" \
	-H "Content-Type: application/vnd.api+json" \
	-H "Authorization: Bearer 360d4f33c02efc5e0f0915014cc50f1ef3ff023cb6aacaad23618b3b0c8c5e8d" \
	-H "Host: example.org" \
	-H "Cookie: "
